CustomField.description: Template for the initial welcome message shown to the user. Supports merge fields like {User.FirstName} and {Record.Name}. This message is for display only and is not added to the chat history sent to the AI.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Create a personalized greeting using merge fields (e.g., "Hello {User.FirstName}! I'm here to help with {Record.Name}."). This message appears when users start a new chat session.
CustomField.label: Welcome Message Template
